DocAttribute.Name: UsageName
DocAttribute.Documentation: Usage description of the _IfcComplexProperty_ within the property set which references the _IfcComplexProperty_. > NOTE  Consider a complex property for glazing properties. The _Name_ attribute of the _IfcComplexProperty_ could be _Pset_GlazingProperties_, and the UsageName attribute could be _OuterGlazingPane_.

DocAttribute.Name: HasProperties
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of properties that can be used within this complex property (may include other complex properties).

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The IfcComplexProperty should not reference itself within the list of HasProperties.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR22
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Each property within the complex property shall have a unique name attribute.
